warehouse

Class Warehouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • warehouse.Warehouse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObservable<IProduct>, IWarehouse, IWarehouseObservable

    public class Warehouse
extends Object
implements IWarehouse, IWarehouseObservable
    Implementation of a warehouse facility where an assortment of IProducts is managed. The implementation is given using the Singleton pattern and thus only one instance of the Warehouse can exist during runtime.

    It provides an implementation for the IWarehouse interface, which specifies the behavior concerning the assortment that is managed by the warehouse. Furthermore, it implements the IObservable interface which allows the registration of IListeners so that they are informed about changes in the warehouse.

    Author:
    OOP

    • Method Detail

      • GET_INSTANCE

        public static IWarehouse GET_INSTANCE()
        Returns an instance of the IWarehouse. To be more precise, it returns the only instance of the IWarehouse since this is a Singleton.
        Returns:
        the instance of the IWarehouse

      • addProduct

        public boolean addProduct(IProduct product)
        Adds a IProduct to assortment of the warehouse.

        All IListeners are notified via IListener.notifyChange(Object) after adding the passed IProduct. If a IListener is of type IWarehouseListener the method IWarehouseListener.productAdded(IProduct) is used instead. In any case, only a copy of the IProduct is contained in the notification.

        If the passed IProduct is already contained in the assortment, or it can't be added, then FALSE is returned and no notification is sent.

        Specified by:
        addProduct in interface IWarehouse
        Parameters:
        product - The IProduct that should be added.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the IProduct has been added, FALSE otherwise.

      • addProducts

        public boolean addProducts(Collection<IProduct> products)
        Adds all IProducts in the passed Collection to the assortment of the warehouse.

        All IListeners are notified via IListener.notifyChange(Object) after adding each single IProduct of the passed Collection. If a IListener is of type IWarehouseListener the method IWarehouseListener.productAdded(IProduct) is used instead. In any case, only a copy of the IProduct is contained in the notification.

        If one of the IProducts in the passed Collection is already contained in the assortment, or it can't be added, then FALSE is returned and no notification is sent (for this one IProduct).

        Specified by:
        addProducts in interface IWarehouse
        Parameters:
        products - The IProducts that should be added.
        Returns:
        TRUE if all IProducts have been added, FALSE otherwise.

      • removeProduct

        public boolean removeProduct(IProduct product)
        Removes a IProduct from the assortment of the warehouse.

        All IListeners are notified via IListener.notifyChange(Object) after removing the passed IProduct. If a IListener is of type IWarehouseListener the method IWarehouseListener.productRemoved(IProduct) is used instead. In any case, only a copy of the IProduct is contained in the notification.

        Specified by:
        removeProduct in interface IWarehouse
        Parameters:
        product - The IProduct that should be removed.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the IProduct has been removed, FALSE otherwise.

      • iterator

        public Iterator<IProduct> iterator()
        Description copied from interface: IWarehouse
        Returns an Iterator for the assortment of the warehouse.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(IListener<IProduct> listener)
        Registers an IListener at the IObservable (if it is not already registered).

        IWarehouse supports registration of listeners that implement the IListener interface (if the IListener uses IProduct as type) as well as the IWarehouseListener interface.

        All IListener are informed via IListener.notifyChange(Object) when an action occurs. No distinction is made on the type of action that has occurred.

        All IWarehouseListener will be informed about currently available IProducts via IWarehouseListener.productAdded(IProduct) after registration. Subsequently, notifications about IProducts are based on the type of action that has occurred (methods IWarehouseListener.productAdded(IProduct) or IWarehouseListener.productRemoved(IProduct)).

        The IListener is only registered if it is not already registered.

        Specified by:
        registerListener in interface IObservable<IProduct>
        Parameters:
        listener - the IListener that should be registered

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(IListener<IProduct> listener)
        Description copied from interface: IObservable
        Unregisters the IListener at the IObservable. The IListener is only unregistered if it is currently registered at the IObservable.
        Specified by:
        unregisterListener in interface IObservable<IProduct>
        Parameters:
        listener - the IListener that should be unregistered

      • updateProduct

        public boolean updateProduct(IProduct product)
        Updates a IProduct in the assortment of the warehouse.

        An update is only performed if the IProduct is contained in the assortment.

        All IListeners are notified via IListener.notifyChange(Object) after updating the corresponding IProduct. If a IListener is of type IWarehouseListener the method IWarehouseListener.notifyChange(IProduct) is used instead. In any case, only a copy of the IProduct is contained in the notification.

        If the passed IProduct is not contained in the assortment, or it can't be updated, then FALSE is returned and no notification is sent.

        Specified by:
        updateProduct in interface IWarehouse
        Parameters:
        product - the IProduct that should be updated.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the IProduct has been updated, FALSE otherwise.
